column8: there was an unusual incident. ------A drunk 24-year-old man
column10: bit it’s throat out and started throwing the blood around. He then did the same to a dog.------As they were his own animals
column11: no crime had been committed authorities have arrived at the scene
column12: at the request of concerned villagers.------The man was detained for treatment at the request of his mother
column13: and taken to a Phnom Penh Hospital after it appeared he had a psychotic episode. ------https://tvfb.news/article/14091
